actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to conduct an assessment of space and satellite security relating to ally and partner countries in the Middle East.
short_title: Middle East Space and Satellite Security Alliance Act of 2024

titles.title: Middle East Space and Satellite Security Alliance Act of 2024
Middle East Space and Satellite Security Alliance Act of 2024
To direct the Secretary of Defense to conduct an assessment of space and satellite security relating to ally and partner countries in the Middle East.
